text: "Bon Appétit" is a song by American singer Katy Perry. It is from her fifth studio album, Witness. The song features hip-hop group Migos. It entered the Billboard Hot 100 at number 76 and has reached number 59 so far on that chart. The song reached the top twenty in Canada. "Bon Appétit" was certified gold in the US for sales and streams of 500,000 copies. == Music video == The video shows Perry being prepared by chefs as a main dish and features Migos. == Release history == List of release dates, showing region, release format, and label Region Date Format Version Label Various April 28, 2017 Original Capitol Italy May 12, 2017 Radio airplay Universal Various May 19, 2017 3lau remix Capitol Martin Jensen remix Muna remix July 21, 2017 Amir Afargan remix August 4, 2017 Aslove remix == References == Category:Katy Perry songs Category:2017 songs
title: Bon Appétit (song)
